item.title: ESM Paper of the Quarter award
item.description:
The ntmscope-publication "High overall mortality of Mycobacterium genavense infections and impact of antimycobacterial therapy: Systematic review and individual patient data meta-analysis" has been awarded ESM's "Paper of the Qarter Award" for Q4 2021.

We are very thankful for the positive feedback. The prize money will be invested in future and ongoing ntmscope-projects.

See the news at the European Society of Mycobacteriology's homepage

See the publication at ntmcope.org

item.title: ntmscope_meta
item.description:
Introduction: Treatment and management of rare NTM remains a considerable challenge as randomized controlled trials or systematic studies are scarce. Most therapeutic recommendations are based on in vitro data or clinical experience with more frequent NTM. The optimal therapy for most infections remains unclear.

Objectives: Investigation of clinical data regarding the clinical manifestations and therapeutic outcomes of rare NTM.

Methods: Literature review, (individual patient data) meta analysis.

Status: Ongoing
